front.title: Multihoming of (1,1,*) configured networks in Network Mobility Support

abstract.t: This draft describes, how NEMO support works with multiple care-of addresses, in a multihomed mobile network, when there exists one home agent, one mobile router, and one or more mobile network prefixes. Solution to the problem, how to register multiple care-of addresses bound to a single home address in a NEMO support, is proposed.
